tasks.description: Deploy all Heady websites directly to optimal production live status. Run strict HeadyBattle tests and enforce zero-tolerance metrics to ensure UI/UX is functionally superior to all competitors (100/100 Lighthouse, superior interactive glassmorphism).
tasks.cli_command: heady deploy all --production --force-optimize && heady battle zero-tolerance --target websites

tasks.description: Ensure every website has a unified, secure Heady Identity Login Option for users to authenticate into the ecosystem.
After a user is authenticated, immediately render the floating HeadyBuddy chat interface seamlessly connecting them to their AI assistant natively on the website.

Utilize Heady Swarms (Bee / Swarm architecture) to instantly multi-thread queries to the 3D Vector Space (HeadyMemory). Pull the authenticated user's persistent facts, preferences, and context securely across the edge.

Empower HeadyBuddy to perform user-defined tasks efficiently across devices. Allow Buddy to 'travel' easily and natively execute operations locally on connected devices or push heavy logic to optimized remote systems. Manage execution states using the Heady SDK.

tasks.domain: 100% Remote Orchestration Lock via Heady CLI
tasks.description: Blast out the pipeline utilizing 100% heady services and 100% remote edge infrastructure (OpenAI, Gemini Edge, Groq). Ensure the entire mesh is operated in an optimized production live state and run a HeadyBattle Arena match to confirm stability.
